description: vol. 4 (bāb al-diyāṭ through kitāb al-ḥudūd). ff. 239. 277 x 184; 205 x 130 mm. 24 lin. Ramaḍān 864; on fol. 1a ownership note of Kamāl al-Dīn ibn al-Ghazzī, Muḥarram 1199. Abridgment of Kifāyat al-nabīh: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 485 (commentary 5, Ausz.). Incip. (bāb al-diyāt): ... وهى المال الواجب بالجناىة على الحر
author: Ibn al-Naqīb, Aḥmad ibn Luʼluʼ, d. 1368
title: Tasʹhīl al-hidāyah fī taḥṣīl al-Kifāyah
creator: Ibn al-Naqīb, Aḥmad ibn Luʼluʼ, d. 1368
subject: Fīrūzābādī al-Shīrāzī, Abū Isḥāq Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī ibn Yūsuf, approximately 1003-1083—Tanbīh fī al-fiqh
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
